name: vehicle-booking-system
description: Vehicle Booking and Monitoring System for Mining Companies

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && export PATH="/usr/local/opt/postgresql@14/bin:$PATH" && PORT=5001 node server.js
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && export PATH="/usr/local/opt/postgresql@14/bin:$PATH" && npm run dev
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.status: echo 'Checking service status...' && curl -s http://localhost:5001/api/health && curl -s http://localhost:3000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules

author: Your Name
